java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node

javafx.scene.layout.Pane

Game_Level_1, Game_Level_10, Game_Level_2, Game_Level_3, Game_Level_4, Game_Level_5, Game_Level_6, Game_Level_7, Game_Level_8, Game_Level_9
public class Game_Pane
extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
a class for setting the controller that control the game scene and game window

Chai Wen Jye
